summary: At the end of the Spanish civil war, Fando, a boy of about ten, tries to make sense of war and his father's arrest. His mother is religious, sympathetic to the Fascists; his father is ... See full summary »
cast: Anouk Ferjac|Núria Espert|Mahdi Chaouch|Ivan Henriques|Jazia Klibi|Suzanne Comte|Jean-Louis Chassigneux|Mohamed Bellasoued|Victor Garcia|Fernando Arrabal
keywords: nihilism|mother bathes son|federico garcia lorca|fascist government|fascist regime
title: Viva la muerte
